Uses of Package
com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.interfaces

  • Packages that use com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.interfaces 
    Package Description
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.interfaces
    This package contains some interfaces, that are unique to NetCom2, but not to any sub-package So, for example, some of those interface define a bridge between 2 decoupled parts, some expanded interface of the function package, such as TriConsumer or TriPredicate, which all may be used freely outside of NetCom2.
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.logging
    This package contains the NetCom2 logging API, which is used in all other modules within NetCom2.
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.client
    This package contains all the relevant classes for the Client.
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.interfaces
    This package contains interfaces, that are relevant for both the server and the client package.
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.server
    This package contains all the relevant classes for the Server.
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared  
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.clients
    This is the core package for Communication.
  • Classes in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.interfaces used by com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.interfaces 
    Class and Description
    Logging
    This interface is the core interface as entry for the Logging api.
  • Classes in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.interfaces used by com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.logging 
    Class and Description
    Logging
    This interface is the core interface as entry for the Logging api.
  • Classes in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.interfaces used by com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.client 
    Class and Description
    DecryptionAdapter
    This interface is used to decrypt any String.
    EncryptionAdapter
    This interface is used to encrypt any String.
    Launch
    This interface abstracts away the implementing interface, to allow it to have a launch() method.
    NetworkInterface
    This Interface is used, to show that something is the entry point for a Network Communication.

  • Classes in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.interfaces used by com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.server 
    Class and Description
    ClientConnectedHandler
    This interface defines what to do, if a new physical Client connected.
    Launch
    This interface abstracts away the implementing interface, to allow it to have a launch() method.
    NetworkInterface
    This Interface is used, to show that something is the entry point for a Network Communication.
  • Classes in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.interfaces used by com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared

  • Classes in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.interfaces used by com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.clients 
    Class and Description
    DecryptionAdapter
    This interface is used to decrypt any String.
    EncryptionAdapter
    This interface is used to encrypt any String.
    Logging
    This interface is the core interface as entry for the Logging api.
    ReceivingService
    The ReceivingService class is the entry-point for receiving objects, that are sent over the network.
    SendingService
    The SendingService class is the entry-point for sending objects over the network.
